display.title: Nether Stars
description: &&aNether Stars&&r are used for high tier &&dSensors&&r, &&dEmitters&&r and &&dField Generators&&r.
You can also use them for &&dBeacons&&r if you desire the permanent potion effects. Finally, a vanilla multiblock!
We've added a recipe for Nether Star Dust in this pack. &&7(Yes - without any tweaks, GTCEu expects you to farm Withers ad nauseam.)
On the topic of the &&aNether Air&&r which is required in the recipe: take a look at &&9Liquid Nether Air&&r distillation at your own leisure. It's quite rewarding.
&&o&&8Did you know the vanilla Nether Star texture isn't centred? :)
